    • Method Detail

      • addGradeEventListener

        public void addGradeEventListener(Grade.GradeEventListener ev)
        Adds an GradeEventListener to the list of registered event listeners for the Grade class
        Parameters:
        ev - Method to be called by the API when a Grade Event occurs.
        See Also:
        Grade.GradeEventListener

      • getAllocationLimit

        public double getAllocationLimit()
        Returns:
        Indicates the transaction limit imposed for any transaction done at the site.

        Note : Where no transaction limit is imposed, the Allocation Limit will be used to determine the maximum transaction value or volume. If this is zero, there is no limit.

      • getAllocationLimitType

        public AllocationLimitType getAllocationLimitType()
        Returns:
        Indicates the type of the allocation limit

      • getBlendPrices

        public GradePriceCollection getBlendPrices(int priceLevel)
        Returns a collection of Ratio / Prices for the defined price level.
        Parameters:
        priceLevel - Required price level (from 1 to the number of price levels setup).
        Returns:
        GradePriceCollection with prices for each blend ratio

      • getBlendRatio

        public double getBlendRatio()
        Returns:
        Indicates the percentage of Grade1 in the mix.

        Note : Applies to blended grades only

      • getBlockedReasons

        public GradeBlockedReasons getBlockedReasons()
        Returns:
        the reasons for which this Grade is blocked

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode()
        Returns:
        Grade code setup in the Enabler Configuration.

        Note : This value is stored in the Oil_Company_Code field

      • getDeliveryTimeout

        public int getDeliveryTimeout()
        Returns:
        Indicates the number of seconds a pump will dispense this grade before displaying a warning to the operator.

        Note : A zero value means this feature is off.

      • getGrade1

        public Grade getGrade1()
        Returns:
        A reference to the first base grade with blended grades.

        Note : For non-blended grades, this parameter returns null.

      • getGrade2

        public Grade getGrade2()
        Returns:
        Returns a reference to the second base grade with blended grades.

        Note : For non-blended grades, this parameter returns null.

      • getGradeType

        public GradeType getGradeType()
        Returns:
        Indicates the type of this grade, base or blended
        See Also:
        GradeType

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of this grade

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice(int priceLevel)
        Get the current price for a price level.
        Parameters:
        priceLevel - The price level to retrieve, starting at 1.
        Returns:
        The Grade's current unit price.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • getPriceLevelCount

        public int getPriceLevelCount()
        Returns:
        Number of price levels on this grade.

        Note : Price levels start from 1.

      • getPriceProfileID

        public int getPriceProfileID()
        Returns:
        The ID of the price profile that is currently being used by this grade.

      • getPriceSignSegment

        public int getPriceSignSegment()
        Returns:
        The segment on a price sign where this grade price is displayed.

      • getUnitOfMeasure

        public UnitOfMeasure getUnitOfMeasure()
        Returns:
        The unit of measure used for this grade.

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        Returns:
        Indicates whether this grade is currently blocked.

        Note : If true, a user has blocked the grade, e.g. during a tanker delivery.

        See Also:
        Hose.isBlocked()

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(Grade.GradeEventListener ev)
        Removes an event listener from the list of registered event listeners for the Grade class.

        Call this method whenever disposing object references in your application having links to this grade. It is highly recommended to call this method otherwise event listeners may still be registered, references maintained and will NOT be garbage collected.

        Parameters:
        ev - The Grade Event Listener to be removed.

      • setBlendPrices

        public void setBlendPrices(int priceLevel,
                  GradePriceCollection prices)
                    throws EnablerException,
                           java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Set the new prices based using passed GradePriceCollection for a defined price level

        Note : This method allows the existing prices/ratio to be changed. You can not add or delete ratios, this has to be done via the configuration application. The prices will not be reflected in the grades prices until the price change method has completed.

        Parameters:
        priceLevel - The price level of the prices to change
        prices - Collection of grade prices
        Throws:
        EnablerException - if the operation fails, includes the ResultCode to indicate the reason. Common ResultCodes include: INVALID_PARAMETER(85), ACCESS_DENIED(86) DATABASE_OFFLINE(87), CONNECT_ERROR(500)
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the priceLevel is not valid.
        InvalidParameterException - if one or more parameters is not valid.
        AccessDeniedException - if the Terminal is not permitted to set prices.

      • setBlocked

        public void setBlocked(boolean block)
                throws EnablerException
        Blocks or Unblocks the grade. Stops any new transactions from using this grade
        Parameters:
        block -
        • true to prevent deliveries on hoses with this grade.
        • false to allow deliveries on hoses with this grade.
        Throws:
        EnablerException - if the operation fails, to indicate the reason.

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(int priceLevel,
            java.lang.Double price)
              throws EnablerException,
                     java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Set a new price for a price level.

        Note : This is for base or fix blend grades only.

        Parameters:
        priceLevel - The price level to change.
        price - The new unit price.
        Throws:
        EnablerException - if the operation fails, includes the ResultCode to indicate the reason. Common ResultCodes include: INVALID_PARAMETER(85), ACCESS_DENIED(86) DATABASE_OFFLINE(87), CONNECT_ERROR(500)
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the priceLevel is not valid.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        grade name
